channel.title: RuneScape
channel.description:
I know there are countless amount of topics on RuneScape memories etc. But I'd just like to make one for the sake of this video I came across in my subscription box. This video was quite inspirational, mainly because of the music I think. The idea of a gathering will not work, never in a hundred years but wouldn't it be awesome If Jagex released a 2006-2007 server like they did with classic, RuneScape remakes don't come close to the real golden years of RS.
Anyway enjoy the video and discuss.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5f_8GSTX_ys
